## Project Details
This is a WhatsApp Sticker Bot built with TypeScript that:
- Converts images sent by users into WhatsApp stickers
- Uses Baileys library for WhatsApp Web API integration
- Supports various image formats (PNG, JPEG, WebP)
- Automatically handles sticker metadata and formatting
